Row.Text: +1 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture for every 5 [ICON_CITIZEN] Citizens in the city.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+3 [ICON_CULTURE] Culture if Themed.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]This unique Museum possesses 3 slots for Great Works of Art and is available earlier. Only Saxony may build it.

This unique Gallery possesses 2 slots for Great Works of Art and is available earlier. Only Saxony may build it.
The Kunsthaus is a mid-game building which increases the city's [ICON_CULTURE] Culture output. Contains 2 slots for Great Works of Art, unlike the Gallery that it replaces.
Our people are now buying your fine porcelain and exploring your ore mountains! We're worried the rest of the world will also succumb to the influence of your culture.
Sponsor Porcelain Manufactory

The secret to the manufactory of fine porcelain has thus far evaded sculptors for centuries. But that is because they did not have the proper funding. With our wealth put to their aide, we shall no doubt discover the mysteries to making porcelain before long.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Saxony [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Must have researched Chemistry [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{1_Num} [ICON_GOLD] Gold [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +2 sources of [ICON_RES_PORCELAIN] Porcelain

The secret to the manufactory of fine porcelain has thus far evaded sculptors for centuries. But that is because they did not have the proper funding. With our wealth put to their aide, we shall no doubt discover the mysteries to making porcelain before long.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive +2 sources of [ICON_RES_PORCELAIN] Porcelain
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has successfully sponsored the manufactory of fine porcelain.
Found the Order of the White Eagle

It gives us the greatest pleasure to formally acnowledge those of our realm who are of the highest order. Henceforth, these men and women shall be known as Knights of the Order of the White Eagle.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Requirement/Restrictions: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Player must be Saxony [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted from the beginning of the {1_EraDesc} [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]May only be enacted once per game [NEWLINE]Costs: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]{2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]1 [ICON_MAGISTRATES] Magistrates [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points whenever a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person is born

It gives us the greatest pleasure to formally acnowledge those of our realm who are of the highest order. Henceforth, these men and women shall be known as Knights of the Order of the White Eagle.[NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Rewards: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Receive [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points whenever a [ICON_GREAT_PEOPLE] Great Person is born
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has founded the Order of the White Eagle, in honour of those held in the highest esteem.
Knight of the White Eagle
This unit is a member of the Order of the White Eagle.
A self-winding wristwatch, made shockproof and double-sided, has been invented in {1_City}.
Animal Tossing

It is time to test our strength, and to engage in the annual animal tossing competition. No doubt we shall make short work of our fellow competitors and, in doing so, impress upon the people.[NEWLINE]
Let us test our strength by tossing {1_Resource}.
We shall show our strength by tossing {1_Resource}.
Today, we show our strength by tossing {1_Resource}.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]All cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 5 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]60% chance that all cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 10 turns[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]20% chance that all cities begin celebrating 'We Love the King Day' for 25 turns[ENDCOLOR]
We have won the animal tossing competition.
We have won the animal tossing competition.
Alas, {1_Resource} has bested us in the animal tossing competition.
We have won the animal tossing competition.
Alas, {1_Resource} has bested us in the animal tossing competition.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has demonstrated his strength in a competition of animal tossing, where he was able to throw a {3_Resource}.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has been humiliated in a competition of animal tossing, where he was unable to throw a {3_Resource}.
Bastard Child

The insatiable power of our loins have once again produced an offspring. The child, a {1_Gender}, is quite {2_Quality}. We must decide whether to acknowledge them as a bastard or otherwise to deny them.[NEWLINE]
We shall acknowledge this one.
That is not mine, clearly!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free {1_Resource}[ENDCOLOR]
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_Num} [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age Points[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain {2_Num} [ICON_CULTURE] Culture[ENDCOLOR]
We have acknowledged a bastard offspring.
We have distanced ourselves from a bastard offspring.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has acknowledged a new bastard child as his offspring.
{1_LeaderName} of {2_CivName} has denied responsibility for a new bastard child claimed to be his offspring.
Christiane Eberhardine of Brandenburg-Bayreuth
